q1.q: How do I book a service?
q1.a: Simply browse our services, select one that fits your needs, and submit a booking request. You'll receive a quote within hours.

q2.q: Can I cancel or modify my booking?
q2.a: Yes, you can cancel or modify your booking according to our cancellation policy. Contact us or the provider directly for changes.

q3.a: Absolutely. Every provider on our platform goes through a thorough verification process before being approved.

q4.a: We support various payment methods including cash, bank transfer, and card payments. Details are provided in your booking confirmation.

q5.q: How far in advance should I book?
q5.a: We recommend booking at least 2-4 weeks in advance for the best availability, though last-minute requests are also welcome.

q6.q: What happens after I submit a request?
q6.a: The provider will review your request and send a detailed quote. You can then accept, negotiate, or explore other options.
